## 2(a)

```{r}
#2x + 5y = 33
#x + 3y = 19
```

```{r}
coef <- c(2,1,5,3)
A = matrix(coef, nrow=2)
A
```
```{r}
values <- c(33,19)
B = matrix(values)
B
```

```{r}
var <- c('x','y')
X = matrix(var)
X
```
```{r}
solve(A,B)
```
## **x = 4  y = 5**

## 2(b)
```{r b, echo=TRUE}
Vector <- c(1:100)
Vector
```
```{r}
s <- sum(Vector)
s
```
```{r}
l<- length(Vector)
l
```
```{r}
s/l
```
## Average of a Vector from 1 to 100 is **50.5**
